Desc.entry: A registered charity which promotes the religious philosophy of spiritualism and its teaching of life after the change called death. Provides spiritual healing. Holds a Christmas fete in December.

ContactName.entry: Mr K Smart, Secretary/Mrs J Smart, President

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon at 7.30pm, Tues 1.30pm (Open Circle), Tues at 11.30am -1.30pm (spiritual healing), Tues at 7.30pm (awareness group), Wed at 7.30pm (evening of clairvoyance with visiting mediums), Friday (special events as advertised), Sat at 7pm (Open Circle and spiritual healing), Sun at 6.30pm (Divine Service)
